allow: Bash(do node -e "const r=require\(''./$f''\); console.log\(''Performance:'', Math.round\(r.categories.performance.score*100\)\); console.log\(''Accessibility:'', Math.round\(r.categories.accessibility.score*100\)\); console.log\(''Best Practices:'', Math.round\(r.categories[''best-practices''].score*100\)\); console.log\(''SEO:'', Math.round\(r.categories.seo.score*100\)\); console.log\(''---''\); console.log\(''FCP:'', r.audits[''first-contentful-paint''].displayValue\); console.log\(''LCP:'', r.audits[''largest-contentful-paint''].displayValue\); console.log\(''CLS:'', r.audits[''cumulative-layout-shift''].displayValue\);")

Bash(python3 -c " import sys import re import json html = sys.stdin.read\(\) # Find JSON data in the report match = re.search\(r''window\\.__LIGHTHOUSE_JSON__\\s*=\\s*\({.*?}\);'', html, re.DOTALL\) if match: data = json.loads\(match.group\(1\)\) cats = data.get\(''categories'', {}\) for name in [''performance'', ''accessibility'', ''best-practices'', ''seo'']: if name in cats: score = cats[name].get\(''score'', 0\) print\(f''{name}: {int\(score * 100\)}''\) ")
